verses.name: Numbers 15:25
verses.text: And the priest shall make an atonement for all the congregation of the children of Israel, and it shall be forgiven them; for it is ignorance: and they shall bring their offering, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord, and their sin offering before the Lord, for their ignorance:

verses.name: Numbers 15:26
verses.text: And it shall be forgiven all the congregation of the children of Israel, and the stranger that sojourneth among them; seeing all the people were in ignorance.

verses.name: Numbers 15:27
verses.text: And if any soul sin through ignorance, then he shall bring a she goat of the first year for a sin offering.
